inspection_translation_door.description: Perform a comprehensive inspection of the translation door.

smoothen_translation_door.description: Ensure the smooth movement of the translation door by sliding it in and out.

check_translation_door.description: Verify if the translation door is fully shut.

cleanse_translation_door.description: Cleanse the translation door to eliminate dust and grime.

verify_status_translation_door.description: Conduct a status check of the translation door.

lubricate_translation_door.description: Enhance the smoothness of the translation door by oiling it.

functionality_test_translation_door.description: Manually slide the translation door in and out to validate its functionality.

sanitise_translation_door.description: Sanitise the translation door to maintain cleanliness.

operate_translation_door.description: Operate the translation door to assess its functionality.

general_inspection_translation_door.description: Perform a general inspection of the translation door.

polish_translation_door.description: Polish the translation door to preserve the finish and keep it looking new.

unclog_translation_door.description: Ensure the translation door is not blocked or caught on something hindering its movement.

test_function_translation_door.description: Test the functionality of the translation door by sliding it in and out.

secure_translation_door.description: Confirm the translation door is fully shut.

wipe_translation_door.description: Wipe the translation door to remove any dust or grime.

check_status_translation_door.description: Perform a status check of the translation door.

oil_translation_door.description: Maintain the translation door by oiling it to make sure it moves smoothly.

manually_move_translation_door.description: Manually slide the translation door in and out to check its functionality.

clean_translation_door.description: Clean the translation door to remove dust or any other particles.

status_check_translation_door.description: Status check of the translation door.

ensure_translation_door_closed.description: Ensure the translation door is securely closed.

check_translation_door_functionality.description: Check the functionality of the translation door by sliding it in and out.

clean_furniture_body.description: Clean the furniture body to reduce dust accumulation.

assess_status_furniture_body.description: Perform an overall status assessment of the furniture body.

inspect_furniture_body.description: Inspect the furniture body for any potential damages.

shift_furniture.description: Reposition the furniture to ensure its stability.

sanitize_furniture_body.description: Sanitise the furniture body surface to maintain hygiene.

evaluate_damage_furniture_body.description: Evaluate the furniture body for any visible signs of damage.

relocate_furniture_body.description: Relocate the furniture body to assess its stability.

sanitise_furniture_body.description: Sanitise the furniture body to ensure cleanliness.

polish_furniture_body.description: Polish the furniture body to preserve the finish and keep it looking new.

general_inspection_furniture_body.description: Perform a general inspection of the furniture body.

assess_furniture_body.description: Review the furniture body to identify any visible damages.

reposition_furniture.description: Reposition the furniture to determine its stability.

wipe_furniture_body.description: Clean the furniture body surface to remove any dust or grime.

slightly_move_furniture.description: Slightly move the furniture to check its stability.

ensure_furniture_stable.description: Ensure the furniture is stable and securely placed.

sanitise_furniture.description: Sanitise the entire furniture including the furniture body and the translation door.

inspection_furniture.description: Perform a comprehensive inspection of the entire furniture.

clean_whole_furniture.description: Clean the entire furniture to maintain cleanliness.

shift_furniture_location.description: Relocate the entire furniture to the desired place.

wipe_down_furniture.description: Wipe down the entire furniture to ensure cleanliness.

relocate_furniture.description: Relocate the entire furniture to a new location.

clean_furniture.description: Thoroughly clean the entire furniture including the furniture body and the translation door.

polish_furniture.description: Polish the whole furniture including the furniture body and the translation door.

general_inspection_furniture.description: Perform a general inspection of the whole furniture, including the furniture body and the translation door.

dust_off_whole_furniture.description: Dust off the entire furniture, namely, the furniture body and the translation door.

wipe_entire_furniture.description: Wipe the entire furniture body and the translation door to ensure they are clean.

dust_off_furniture.description: Dust off the entire furniture including the furniture body, and translation door.

move_entire_furniture.description: Pick and place the entire furniture to a new location.

clean_all.description: Clean the entire furniture including the translation door and the furniture body.

open_and_close.description: Test the entire furniture's functionality by sliding the door in and out.

check_furniture_placement.description: Confirm the furniture is securely placed and stable.
